content: चर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [चर्-अच्] {@--1@} Moving, going, walking; grazing &c.; धर्मारण्यचरेषु प्राणिषु <ls>Ś. 5. 9</ls> {@--2@} Following, practising (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>). {@--3@} Trembling, shaking. {@--4@} Moveable; see चराचर below; <ls>Ms. 3. 201</ls>; <ls>Bg. 13. 15.</ls> {@--5@} Animate; <ls>Ms. 5. 29</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">7. 15.</ls> {@--6@} (Used as an affix) formerly, late; आढ्यचर ‘one who was formerly rich’; so देवदत्तचरः अध्यापकचर late teacher &c. --रः {@--1@} A spy. {@--2@} A wagtail. {@--3@} A game played with dice and men. {@--4@} A cowrie. {@--5@} The planet Mars. {@--6@} (Hence) Tuesday. {@--7@} The seventh Karaṇa in astrology. {@--8@} The Karaṇas taken collectively. {@--9@} The difference of time between two meridians. {@--10@} The first, fourth, seventh, and tenth signs of the zodiac.
